name: Identity Hawk
overview:
Using the data you enter in your identity profile, IdentityHawk calculates your Identity Health Score by analyzing the amount and types of your personal information that we detect across the Internet. You can get your identity theft risk calculated and take an action depending on the result.

As the part of the service IdentityHawk offers three kinds of identity security monitoring:

* Identity Monitoring. The software comb the Internet for &#8220;events&#8221; where your personal identifying information (e.g., names, current and previous addresses and phone numbers, your Social Security number) is being used.
* Breach Alert Monitoring. When a company or organization reports lost or stolen personal data, IdentityHawk will help you determine whether you&#8217;re at risk.
* Cyber Monitoring. IdentityHawk monitoring service scours the deepest corners of the Internet to search for your personal information in &#8220;black market&#8221; chat rooms and other clandestine sites where identity thieves sell their stolen data.
  • Identity Theft Insurance. If you become a victim of identity theft or fraud, you’re eligible for up to $1 million in coverage for out-of-pocket expenses.
